description.author: Salesforce
text: Component that extends Lightning Datatable to provide custom cell types for toggles and buttons or formatted text.

elements.name: tableToggle
elements.description: Represents the custom toggle switch component used for inputToggle type cells

elements.name: textOrBaseButton
elements.description: Represents the custom button component used for textOrBaseButton type cells

elements.name: formattedText
elements.description: Represents the custom formatted text component used as an alternative to the button in textOrBaseButton type cells
